title: Electric field and potential inside conductor

content.question: Which of the following describes the electric field and electric potential inside a charged solid spherical conductor that is in electrostatic equilibrium?

choices.label:
Field: Nonzero and uniform
Potential: Zero

Field: Nonzero and uniform
Potential: Nonzero and uniform

Field: Zero
Potential: Nonzero and uniform

Field: Zero
Potential: Nonzero and nonuniform

content.answer:
Field: Zero
Potential: Nonzero and uniform

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
